remarks: In a normal space, any two disjoint closed sets have the property that each one is a subset of an open set whose closure is disjoint from the other.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Feb-2010.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Aug-2015.)
